data.title: globalfoils
data.text:
Craig Eddy - CEO

Craig has worked in many senior positions throughout his 31 year career in the aluminum industry. Craig served as the President and CEO of Coastal Aluminum Rolling Mills, Senior Vice President at JW Aluminum and Vice President of Operations at Nichols Aluminum. Craig comes to the company with an extensive background in finance and numerous contacts in the industry. Craig is a past Chairman of the Board of Directors of The Aluminum Association. He received his undergraduate degree from the University of Illinois and is a graduate of the MBA program at Washington University in St. Louis, MO.

Denis Heroux - President

During his 23 years of experience in the aluminum foil industry, Denis has worked in many key management positions for some of the most well-known aluminum companies in North America. Denis was the Director of Sales for Corus Aluminum/Reynolds Aluminum Canada, Sales Manager for JW Aluminum, Business Development Manager for Charleston Aluminum and Vice President for Global Converting Distribution. Denis is a graduate of the MBA Business program at the University of Quebec in Montreal. Over the years, Denis has shown his dedication to this industry and his intention is to continue that dedication for many years to come.

Jessica Porter - Financial Administrator

Jessica has gained a wealth of knowledge in the aluminum industry since joining the team in 2016. While she wears many hats in the company, her primary focus is on the financial and administrative aspects. Jessica has a diverse background, having previously worked with medical insurance claims and in home health case management. She earned her undergraduate degree from Boston University and now resides in Georgia with her husband and three children.
